items.text: yorker on the stumps, almost tumbles over as he keeps it out on the leg side

items.text: shortish, curves into him off the deck, punched away into the off side

items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Dickwella, 2 runs

items.preText:
Shakib

Andrew: "Mendis was not great today, but in his defense, I would like to quote Rahul Dravid as somebody that was pilloried for only being good at tests but eventually became a very serviceable ODI play as well. Remember that SL has a very small talent pool (population 21M) compared to neighbours like India, Pakistan or Bangladesh; it would be extremely unwise to jettison a 22-year-old that has shown clear signs of talent before he has had a few series."
items.text: slider on leg, misses the flick and gets hit the pad
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Chandimal, no run

items.text: susses out the length very early and advances down the ground to meet the pitch before carving it over long-on. A 90-metre biggie
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Chandimal, SIX runs

items.text: comes down the track and punches this along the ground through wide long-off
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Chandimal, 2 runs

items.text: some feet movement again, drilled to long-on this time
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Chandimal, 1 run

items.text: loopy fullish length ball on middle, flicked into midwicket
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Dickwella, 1 run

items.text: good length on middle, defended off the front foot into the off side

items.text: short of a length, tucked to midwicket

items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Dickwella, 1 run

items.text: fullish, angling in on off, punched to long-off

items.text: keeps low. It's all working against Sri Lanka now. A short of a length delivery, keeps a little low but not like the batsman isn't to blame at all. DIckwella is caught on neither foot rooted to the crease and simply swipes with the ball cutting into him. Gets under the bat and flattens the stumps
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Dickwella, OUT

dismissal.text: N Dickwella  b Mustafizur Rahman 16 (22b 0x4 0x6) SR: 72.72

items.text: pitches it further up along a similar line, drilled back

items.text: good length, curving in towards a fourth or fifth-stump channel and turning away sharply. Gunaratne stays in the crease and swishes. Beaten

items.preText: eddie: "I had the game going on the TV as I was busy working, just hearing the commentary and occasionally checking the score on Cricinfo. Then all of a sudden, I hear a rush of people screaming in joy. The Fizz just took a wicket. Even as a neutral, that sort of fan following for a cricket match sends shivers down my back."
items.text: full, well wide of him, swings big and misses
